WorkItem.Summary: List of badcharacters for "DataGrid problem when a DataColumn name has..."

Comments.Message:
Ok, i wrote a list file and test the DataTable on typical special charaters...

My Result is:

( = open bracket

) = closed bracket

[ = open square bracket

] = closed square bracket

. = dot

/ = Slash

\ = Backslash

 

crash the cell's of a DataTable if this characters are in the DateColumnName...
